title: Microsoft Opentype Font File Properties Extension Query
content:
I hope this is the right forum for this.

I'm running this Microsoft utility under Windows 7 Pro x32 on another machine. Whenever I try to use this utility, system brings up Windows Installer with an error message that says:  
"Windows Installer is looking for, but can't find:  
Microsoft Opentype Font File Properties Extension.msi"

... and gives a browse function for this installer file.

This utility works fine if I select the "cancel" button on Installer window, however.

I've tried removing this utility to reinstall it, but I get the same error message. Could anyone shed some light on what the problem could be?

Also, will this utility run under Windows 7 Pro x64?
author: Iain-

comments.content: As for Font Property Extension on 64-bit, the answer is yes but see [this discussion](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317222935/http:/groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/comp.fonts/OnMH5MuqY1I) for instructions:
